style.name: regular
style.description: custom style used to display regular text

style.name: pagedescription
style.description: custom style used to display the page description in the page headers

style.name: pagetitle
style.description: custom style used to display the page title in standard page headers

style.name: menuitem
style.description: custom style used to display menu items, if those items are not selected

style.name: selectedmenuitem
style.description: custom style used to display menu items, if those items are selected

style.name: tabitem
style.description: custom style used to display tab items, if those items are not selected

style.name: selectedtabitem
style.description: custom style used to display tab items, if those items are selected

style.name: blocktitle
style.description: custom style used to display the title of a block

style.name: portallink
style.description: custom style used to display the portal link

style.name: searchfield
style.description: custom style used to display search fields

style.name: searchbutton
style.description: custom style used to display search buttons

style.name: printableapplicationname
style.description: custom style used to display the name of an application, when in the printable mode

style.name: numentitiesfound
style.description: custom style used to display the number of entities found in results tables

style.name: donoprint
style.description: custom style used to include elements not to be printed

style.name: entryfield
style.description: custom style used to display entry fields

style.name: entrybutton
style.description: custom style used to display entry buttons

style.name: entrylabel
style.description: custom style used to display entry labels

style.name: signinlink
style.description: custom style used to display the sign-in link

style.name: activeentryformblocktitle
style.description: custom style used to display the title of an entry form block

style.name: message
style.description: custom style used to display error, validation or info messages

style.name: displayonlyfield
style.description: custom style used to display display-only fields in entry and search forms

style.name: applicationname
style.description: custom style used to display the application name in page headers

style.name: languageselect
style.description: custom style used to display the language selection pull-down menu

style.name: searchsitefield
style.description: custom style used to display the search site field at the top of the page

style.name: inactiveentryformblocktitle
style.description: custom style used to display the title of an entry form block

style.name: sideblocktitle
style.description: custom style used to display the title of a small block

style.name: searchformbody
style.description: custom style used to display the name of the columns in results tables

style.name: regular
style.description: custom style used to display regular text in entry forms

style.name: inactivesearchformblocktitle
style.description: custom style used to display the title of an search form block

style.name: activesearchformblocktitle
style.description: custom style used to display the title of an entry form block

style.name: searchlabel
style.description: custom style used to display search labels

style.name: listing
style.description: custom style used to display items in lists

style.name: selectedcolumntitle
style.description: custom style used to display the name of the sort columns in results tables

style.name: selectedcurrenttabitem
style.description: custom style used to display tab items, if those items are selected

style.name: textvisibleonly
style.description: custom style used to display text visible only to text-browsers

style.name: message
style.description: custom style used to display messages inside forms

style.name: departmentname
style.description: custom style used to display department names

style.name: departmentdescription
style.description: custom style used to display department descriptions

style.name: accountname
style.description: style used to display account names

style.name: accountdescription
style.description: style used to display account descriptions

style.name: groupname
style.description: style used to display group names

style.name: groupdescription
style.description: style used to display group descriptions

style.name: contentpath
style.description: style used to display content paths

style.name: contentdescription
style.description: style used to display content descriptions

style.name: contenttitle
style.description: style used to display content titles

style.name: contentbody
style.description: style used to display content bodies
